trans-unit.note: Table Service Type - Property Caption
Page Service Types - Action ActionName - Property Caption
Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Property Caption
Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control Options - Property Caption
Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control Find Payments - Property Caption
Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control LastPaymentDate - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies the latest payment date that can appear on the vendor ledger entries to be included in the batch job. Only entries that have a due date or a payment discount date before or on this date will be included. If the payment date is earlier than the system date, a warning will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Určuje poslední (nejmladší) datum splatnosti dodavatelských položek, které mají být zahrnuty do této dávkové úlohy. Zahrnuty budou pouze položky s datem splatnosti nebo datem platebního skonta menším nebo shodným s nastaveným datem. Bude zobrazeno upozornění pokud je datum platby dřívější než systémové datum.
trans-unit.note: Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control LastPaymentDate - Property ToolTip
Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control FindPaymentDiscounts - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies if you want the batch job to include vendor ledger entries for which you can receive a payment discount.
trans-unit.target: Určuje, zda chcete, aby dávková úloha zahrnula položky dodavatele, pro které můžete obdržet skonto.
trans-unit.note: Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control FindPaymentDiscounts - Property ToolTip
Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control UseVendorPriority - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies if the Priority field on the vendor cards will determine in which order vendor entries are suggested for payment by the batch job. The batch job always prioritizes vendors for payment suggestions if you specify an available amount in the Available Amount (LCY) field.
trans-unit.target: Definuje zda pole Priorita v kartě dodavatele určuje v jakém pořadí budou položky dodavatele navržené dávkovou úlohou k proplacení. Dávková úloha vždy upřednostňuje dodavatele v návrhu plateb v případě zadání dostupné částky v poli Částka k dispozici (LM).
trans-unit.note: Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control UseVendorPriority - Property ToolTip
Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control Available Amount (LCY) - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies a maximum amount (in LCY) that is available for payments. The batch job will then create a payment suggestion on the basis of this amount and the Use Vendor Priority check box. It will only include vendor entries that can be paid fully.
trans-unit.target: Určuje maximální částku (v LM), která je pro platby k dispozici. Dávková úloha potom na základě této částky vytvoří návrh platby a políčko Použít prioritu dodavatele. Bude obsahovat pouze položky dodavatele, které mohou být úplně zaplaceny.
trans-unit.note: Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control Available Amount (LCY) - Property ToolTip
Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control SkipExportedPayments - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies if you do not want the batch job to insert payment journal lines for documents for which payments have already been exported to a bank file.
trans-unit.target: Určuje, zda nechcete, aby dávková úloha vložila řádky deníku plateb pro doklady, pro které již byly exportovány platby do souboru banky.
trans-unit.note: Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control SkipExportedPayments - Property ToolTip
Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control CheckOtherJournalBatches - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to exclude payments that are already included in another journal batch from new suggested payments. This helps avoid duplicate payments.
trans-unit.note: Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control CheckOtherJournalBatches - Property ToolTip
Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control Summarize Results - Property Caption
Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control SummarizePerVendor - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies if you want the batch job to make one line per vendor for each currency in which the vendor has ledger entries. If, for example, a vendor uses two currencies, the batch job will create two lines in the payment journal for this vendor. The batch job then uses the Applies-to ID field when the journal lines are posted to apply the lines to vendor ledger entries. If you do not select this check box, then the batch job will make one line per invoice.
trans-unit.target: Určuje, zda chcete, aby dávková úloha vytvářela jeden řádek za každého dodavatele a každou měnu z položek dodavatele. Například dodavatel používá dvě měny pro fakturaci, tak dávková úloha vytvoří dva řádky v deníku plateb pro tohoto dodavatele. Dávková úloha použije pole Nastavit pole vyrovnání během účtování řádků deníku pro vyrovnání položek dodavatele. Pokud toto políčko není zaškrtnuté, bude dávková úloha vytvářet jeden řádek za každý doklad.
trans-unit.note: Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control SummarizePerVendor - Property ToolTip
Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control SummarizePerDimText - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies the dimensions that you want the batch job to consider.
trans-unit.target: Určuje dimenze, které má dávková úloha zvážit.
trans-unit.note: Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control SummarizePerDimText - Property ToolTip
Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control Fill in Journal Lines - Property Caption
Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control PostingDate - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies the date for the posting of this batch job. By default, the working date is entered, but you can change it.
trans-unit.target: Určuje zúčtovací datum pro tuto dávkovou úlohu. Jako výchozí je vloženo pracovní datum, ale můžete jej změnit.
trans-unit.note: Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control PostingDate - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Calculate Posting Date from Applies-to-Doc. Due Date
trans-unit.target: Vypočítat zúčtovací datum z datumu splatnosti vyrovnání dokladu
trans-unit.note: Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control UseDueDateAsPostingDate - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies if the due date on the purchase invoice will be used as a basis to calculate the payment posting date.
trans-unit.target: Určuje, zda se datum splatnosti v nákupní faktuře použije jako základ pro výpočet zúčtovacího data platby.
trans-unit.note: Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control UseDueDateAsPostingDate - Property ToolTip
Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control DueDateOffset - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies a period of time that will separate the payment posting date from the due date on the invoice. Example 1: To pay the invoice on the Friday in the week of the due date, enter CW-2D (current week minus two days). Example 2: To pay the invoice two days before the due date, enter -2D (minus two days).
trans-unit.target: Určuje časový úsek, který oddělí datum platby od data splatnosti na faktuře . Příklad 1: Pro zaplacení faktury v pátek v týdnu do kterého spadá datum splatnosti zadejte CW-2D (aktuální týden mínus dva dny). Příklad 2: Pro platbu dva dny před datem splatnosti faktury, zadejte -2D (mínus dva dny).
trans-unit.note: Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control DueDateOffset - Property ToolTip
Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control StartingDocumentNo - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies the next available number in the number series for the journal batch that is linked to the payment journal. When you run the batch job, this is the document number that appears on the first payment journal line. You can also fill in this field manually.
trans-unit.target: Určuje další dostupné číslo z číselné řady listu deníku, který je spojen s deníkem plateb. Při spuštění dávkové úlohy je to číslo dokladu, který se zobrazí na prvním řádku deníku plateb. Pole můžete také vyplnit ručně.
trans-unit.note: Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control StartingDocumentNo - Property ToolTip
Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control NewDocNoPerLine - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies if you want the batch job to fill in the payment journal lines with consecutive document numbers, starting with the document number specified in the Starting Document No. field.
trans-unit.target: Určuje, zda chcete, aby dávková úloha vyplnila řádky deníku plateb po sobě jdoucími čísly dokladu, počínaje číslem dokladu určeném v poli Počáteční číslo dokladu.
trans-unit.note: Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control NewDocNoPerLine - Property ToolTip
Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control BalAccountType - Property Caption
Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control BalAccountType - Property OptionCaption

trans-unit.source: Specifies the balancing account type that payments on the payment journal are posted to.
trans-unit.target: Určuje typ vyrovnávacího účtu, na který jsou platby v deníku plateb zaúčtovány.
trans-unit.note: Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control BalAccountType - Property ToolTip
Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control BalAccountNo - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies the balancing account number that payments on the payment journal are posted to.
trans-unit.target: Určuje číslo vyrovnávacího účtu, na který jsou platby v deníku plateb zaúčtovány.
trans-unit.note: Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control BalAccountNo - Property ToolTip
Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control BankPaymentType - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies selection of the bank payment type (check type) you are using in case you use bank account as the balancing account type.
trans-unit.target: Určuje výběr typu platby v bance (typ šeku) použitý v případě, že používáte bankovní účet jako typ protiúčtu.
trans-unit.note: Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - Control BankPaymentType - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: In the Last Payment Date field, specify the last possible date that payments must be made.
trans-unit.target: Do pole Poslední datum splatnosti zadejte poslední možní datum, kdy musí být platba uhrazena.
trans-unit.note: Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - NamedType Text000

trans-unit.source: In the Posting Date field, specify the date that will be used as the posting date for the journal entries.
trans-unit.target: Do pole Zúčtovací datum zadejte datum, které bude použito jako datum zaúčtování položek deníku.
trans-unit.note: Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - NamedType Text001

trans-unit.source: In the Starting Document No. field, specify the first document number to be used.
trans-unit.target: Do pole Počáteční číslo dokladu zadejte první číslo dokladu, které bude použité.
trans-unit.note: Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - NamedType Text002

trans-unit.source: The payment date is earlier than %1.\\Do you still want to run the batch job?
trans-unit.target: Datum platby je dříve než %1.\\Opravdu chcete spustit dávku?
trans-unit.note: %1 is a date
Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - NamedType Text003
Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - NamedType Text005
Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - NamedType Text006
Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - NamedType Text007
Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - NamedType Text008

trans-unit.source: %1 must be G/L Account or Bank Account.
trans-unit.target: %1 musí být finančním nebo bankovním účtem.
trans-unit.note: Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - NamedType Text009

trans-unit.source: %1 must be filled only when %2 is Bank Account.
trans-unit.target: %1 musí být vyplněno pouze, pokud %2 je bankovním účtem.
trans-unit.note: Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - NamedType Text010

trans-unit.source: Use Vendor Priority must be activated when the value in the Amount Available field is not 0.
trans-unit.target: Možnost Použít prioritu dodavatele, musí být aktivní, pokud hodnota pole Částka k dispozici není rovna 0.
trans-unit.note: Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - NamedType Text011

trans-unit.source: Use Vendor Priority must be activated when the value in the Amount Available Amount (LCY) field is not 0.
trans-unit.target: Volba Použít prioritu dodavatele musí být aktivní, pokud hodnota v poli Částka k dispozici (LM) není rovna 0.
trans-unit.note: Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - NamedType Text013

trans-unit.source: If %1 = %2 and you have not selected the Summarize per Vendor field,\ then you must select the New Doc. No. per Line.
trans-unit.target: Pokud %1 = %2 a nevybrali jste pole Dodavatel na jeden řádek,\pak musíte vybrat Nové číslo dokladu na řádek.
trans-unit.note: If Bank Payment Type = Computer Check and you have not selected the Summarize per Vendor field,\ then you must select the New Doc. No. per Line.
Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - NamedType Text017

trans-unit.source: You have only created suggested vendor payment lines for the %1 %2.\ However, there are other open vendor ledger entries in currencies other than %2.\\
trans-unit.target: Vytvořili jste pouze řádky navržených plateb dodavateli pro %1 %2.\Nicméně v položkách dodavatele existují další otevřené položky v měnách jiných než %2.\\
trans-unit.note: You have only created suggested vendor payment lines for the Currency Code EUR.\ However, there are other open vendor ledger entries in currencies other than EUR.
Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - NamedType Text020

trans-unit.source: You have only created suggested vendor payment lines for the %1 %2.\ There are no other open vendor ledger entries in other currencies.\\
trans-unit.target: Vytvořili jste pouze řádky navržených plateb dodavateli pro %1 %2.\Neexistují žádné další otevřené položky dodavatele v jiných měnách.\\
trans-unit.note: You have only created suggested vendor payment lines for the Currency Code EUR\ There are no other open vendor ledger entries in other currencies.\\
Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - NamedType Text021

trans-unit.source: You have created suggested vendor payment lines for all currencies.\\
trans-unit.target: Vytvořili jste řádky navržených plateb dodavateli ve všech měnách.
trans-unit.note: Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - NamedType Text022

trans-unit.source: There are one or more entries for which no payment suggestions have been made because the posting dates of the entries are later than the requested posting date. Do you want to see the entries?
trans-unit.target: Existuje jedna nebo více položek, pro které nebyly vytvořeny žádné návrhy plateb, protože zúčtovací data těchto položek následují po zadaném zúčtovacím datu. Chcete tyto položky zobrazit?
trans-unit.note: Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - NamedType Text024

trans-unit.source: The %1 with the number %2 has a %3 with the number %4.
trans-unit.note: Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - NamedType Text025

trans-unit.source: For one or more entries, the requested posting date is before the work date.\\These posting dates will use the work date.
trans-unit.target: U jedné nebo více položek je požadované zúčtovací datum před pracovním datem.\\Jako zúčtovací datum bude použito pracovní datum.
trans-unit.note: Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - NamedType ReplacePostingDateMsg

trans-unit.source: You cannot use Find Payment Discounts or Summarize per Vendor together with Calculate Posting Date from Applies-to-Doc. Due Date, because the resulting posting date might not match the payment discount date.
trans-unit.target: Nemůžete využít Nalézt skonto nebo Sumarizovat za dodavatele s volbou Vypočti zúčtovací datum z Datumu splatnosti vyrovnání dokladu, protože výsledný zúčtovací datum by nemusel odpovídat datumu skonta.
trans-unit.note: Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - NamedType PmtDiscUnavailableErr
%1 document type, %2 Document No.
Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - NamedType MessageToRecipientMsg

trans-unit.source: The value in the Starting Document No. field must have a number so that we can assign the next number in the series.
trans-unit.note: Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - NamedType StartingDocumentNoErr

trans-unit.source: There are payments in other journal batches that are not suggested here. This helps avoid duplicate payments. To add them to this batch, remove the payment from the other batch, and then suggest payments again.\\Do you want to review the payments from the other journal batches now?
trans-unit.note: Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - NamedType ReviewNotSuggestedLinesQst
There are payments in Journal Template Name PAYMENT, Journal Batch Name GENERAL, Applies-to Doc. No. 101321
Report Suggest Vendor Payments OP - NamedType NotSuggestedPaymentInfoTxt

trans-unit.source: settle vat value added tax,report vat value added tax
trans-unit.note: Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - Property AdditionalSearchTerms
Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - Property Caption
Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - Control Options - Property Caption
Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - Control StartingDate - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies the first date in the period from which VAT entries are processed in the batch job.
trans-unit.target: Určuje první datum v období, od kterého jsou zpracovány položky DPH v dávkové úloze.
trans-unit.note: Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - Control StartingDate - Property ToolTip
Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - Control EndDateReq - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies the last date in the period from which VAT entries are processed in the batch job.
trans-unit.target: Určuje poslední datum v období, ze kterého jsou zpracovány položky DPH v dávkové úloze.
trans-unit.note: Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - Control EndDateReq - Property ToolTip
Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - Control PostingDt - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies the date on which the transfer to the VAT account is posted. This field must be filled in.
trans-unit.target: Určuje s jakým datem je převod zaúčtován na účet DPH. Toto pole musí být vyplněno.
trans-unit.note: Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - Control PostingDt - Property ToolTip
Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - Control DocumentNo - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies a document number. This field must be filled in.
trans-unit.target: Určuje číslo dokladu. Toto pole musí být vyplněno.
trans-unit.note: Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - Control DocumentNo - Property ToolTip
Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - Control SettlementAcc - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of the VAT settlement account. Select the field to see the chart of account. This field must be filled in.
trans-unit.target: Určuje číslo účtu vyrovnání DPH. Vybráním pole zobrazíte účetní osnovu. Toto pole musí být vyplněno.
trans-unit.note: Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - Control SettlementAcc - Property ToolTip
Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - Control ShowVATEntries - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies if you want the report that is printed during the batch job to contain the individual VAT entries. If you do not choose to print the VAT entries, the settlement amount is shown only for each VAT posting group.
trans-unit.target: Určuje, zda chcete, aby sestava tisknutá v průběhu provádění dávkové úlohy obsahovala jednotlivé položky DPH. Pokud nevyberete tisk položek DPH, částka vyrovnání je zobrazena pouze pro každou účto skupinu DPH.
trans-unit.note: Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - Control ShowVATEntries - Property ToolTip
Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - Control Post - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies if you want the program to post the transfer to the VAT settlement account automatically. If you do not choose to post the transfer, the batch job only prints a test report, and Test Report (not Posted) appears on the report.
trans-unit.target: Určuje, zda chcete, aby program automaticky účtoval přenos na účet vyrovnání DPH. Pokud se pro účtování přenosu nerozhodnete, dávková úloha vytiskne pouze testovací sestavu a testovací sestava (neúčtováno) se zobrazí v sestavě.
trans-unit.note: Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - Control Post - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Show Amounts in Add. Reporting Currency
trans-unit.target: Zobrazit částky v příd. měně pro hlášení
trans-unit.note: Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - Control AmtsinAddReportingCurr - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies if the reported amounts are shown in the additional reporting currency.
trans-unit.target: Specifies if the reported amounts are shown in the additional reporting currency.
trans-unit.note: Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - Control AmtsinAddReportingCurr - Property ToolTip
Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - Control CountryCodeFillFiter - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies performance country code for VAT entries filtr.
trans-unit.target: Určuje kód země výkonu pro filtr položek DPH.
trans-unit.note: Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - Control CountryCodeFillFiter - Property ToolTip
Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - NamedType Text000
Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - NamedType Text001
Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - NamedType Text002

trans-unit.source: Do you want to calculate and post the VAT Settlement?
trans-unit.target: Chcete vypočítat a zaúčtovat vyrovnání DPH?
trans-unit.note: Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - NamedType Text003
Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - NamedType Text004
Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - NamedType Text005
%1 = Currency Code

Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - NamedType Text007
Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - NamedType Text008

Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - NamedType PageCaptionLbl
Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - NamedType TestReportnotpostedCaptionLbl
Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - NamedType DocNoCaptionLbl
Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - NamedType SettlementAccCaptionLbl
Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - NamedType DocumentTypeCaptionLbl
Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - NamedType UserIDCaptionLbl
Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - NamedType TotalCaptionLbl
Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - NamedType SettlementCaptionLbl

trans-unit.source: Document No. is too long (max. %1 characters).
trans-unit.target: Číslo dokladu je příliš dlouhé (max.%1 zn.).
trans-unit.note: %1=Max length of VAT Settlement No.
Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - NamedType DocNoErr
%1="Country/Region Code"
Report OP Calc. and Post VAT Stlmt. - NamedType CountrySubtotalCaptionLbl

trans-unit.source: Create payment suggestions as lines in the payment journal.
trans-unit.target: Vytvořte návrh plateb jako řádky v deníku plateb.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension PaymentJournalExt - Action SuggestVendorPaymentsOP - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: OP Calculate and Post VAT Settlement
trans-unit.note: PageExtension VATStatementExt - Action CalcAndPostOP - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Close open VAT entries and transfers purchase and sales VAT amounts to the VAT settlement account.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension VATStatementExt - Action CalcAndPostOP - Property ToolTip
